attributes.action: Revert the UK to its sovereign status prior to the European Communities Act 1972
attributes.additional_details:
If you voted Leave then you MUST sign this to show you won't stand for the referendum being a pseudo-democratic process whilst the status quo endures.

As with the referendum, make your voice be heard, stating that you are not only sick of the Westminster bubble, but that you will not conform to their fascist EU and Bilderberg corporate masters, looking upon us as nothing more than expendable capital.
attributes.background: Concensus of Leave voters was to sever all ties with EU, inc. Single Market, which follows free movement of labour, capital, goods & services. Politicians openly intend to remain in Single Market, some showing disdain for Brexit victory, & Sadiq Khan calling for devolution of London from rest of UK.

rejection.details: If you don't want the UK to be in the single market, you may wish to sign this petition: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/149124
